author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 41-year-old man surrendered before the police after murdering his wife and daughter on Saturday night.

Frequent quarrels

Police said Prabhakaran, a resident of Thiruparkadal, had frequent quarrels with his wife Rathi (35).

The couple also had a 12-year-old daughter.

On Saturday night, the couple had a fight.

All of a sudden Prabhakaran hit his wife with an iron rod.

Their daughter, Hema, also sustained injuries when she had tried to help her mother. The duo succumbed to injuries.

Surrendered

Prabhakaran surrendered before the police following the murder. The Kaveripakkam police have registered a case.
title: Man held for murdering wife, daughter
